name: Untitled Ghost Game (TheFrozenKnight, Shutupsidhant, Shadownit15, Pacific, celestialdeviant)
name_original: Untitled Ghost Game (TheFrozenKnight, Shutupsidhant, Shadownit15, Pacific, celestialdeviant)
description:
Game Design Document

Made for Global Game Jam 2022

Style: 2D

Genre:  Puzzle/Platform

Concept: Switch between human and your ghost Form and make your human body reach the end of the level.

There’s a timer for the ghost mode as soon as the timer runs out the player dies.

Quick reset on death

Art Style: Pixel art
